climbs.name: All Mine
climbs.fa: R Barley, N Henderson, P Cooper, 2018

content.description:
If this route was in the parking lot it would be climbed all day long. Instead it's at the top of Smoke Bluffs and in sad need of cleaning. Despite the moss it's fairly secure. Bring a scrubbing brush if you're coming up this way.



This is the obvious crack in the center of the crag that goes straight up and merges with a left leaning crack to get to the top. 


single rack, no chains at the top (just two bolts and a funny-looking glued-in rap ring a couple of feet left) so walk off by using the mountain bike trail at the back of the crag

I only added this area as it was mentioned in the Smoke Bluffs Interconnector  mountainproject.com/route/1… and it took us a while to find it.

We gave directions below, from the top of Octopus Garden crag, as Octopus is quite popular and therefore potentially the shortest way. Themyscira is also accessible from the loop trail but looks like no one ever comes up here, sadly. Hoping that the exact coordinates (as taken from my phone at the base of the crag) will also be helpful. 49.7078202, -123.1349960
